channel.title: Project 2006 RSPS
channel.description:
[center][img]http://project2006.com/img/title2/rslogo3.gif[/img][/center] [CENTER][B][SIZE=7]PROJECT 2006[/SIZE][/B]
EXP RATE 10X
[size=14pt][B]WEBSITE: [url=http://project2006.com]Project 2006[/url]
DOWNLOAD: [url=http://project2006.com/client.jar]http://project2006.com/client.jar[/url][/B][/SIZE]
[B][SIZE=7]ONLINE 24/7[/SIZE][/B]
[youtube]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7CrcGjuKjYU[/youtube]
Developers:
Mod Ali
Features:
SKILL CAPES !! Fully Clipped NPC Perfect Combat Pvp Fully complete Pvn Fully complete All Skills Work Many minigames All Random Events Pets Working Highscores Working Vote Donate for Double Exp Rings (equivalent of 4 weekends) - and a donator rank! Treasure Trails Skill Interfaces Nostalgic Feel UID Supported. Most BUGS+DUPES Fixed Cooking Perfected Fishing Perfected Mining Perfected Fletching perfected Mining guild requirements. 377 game frame Fullscreen image loading All shops in Lumbridge, Varrock, Falador finished Much more play to see.
Quests:
Cook's Assistant
More are being added.
Quests:
Cook's Assistant Doric's Quest Imp Catcher Romeo & Juliet
MORE CONTENT WILL BE POSTED.. Media: [img]http://i.imgur.com/jbZrfMz.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/i3XBEbP.png[/img] [IMG]http://project2006.com/img/4.png[/img] [IMG]http://project2006.com/img/5.png[/img] [IMG]http://project2006.com/img/6.png[/img]

[quote=“SynchroRS, post:21, topic:547503”][quote author=Elrick link=topic=666409.msg4455384#msg4455384 date=1414459897]
What is the goal of the server? We’ve seen plenty of remakes, so what makes this one so different? Also, what is the exp rate?
[/quote]
His goal of this server? i can tell you that because i have made several rsps servers with him. His goal is to scam as many people as possible and get as much money out of his players as he can. He stole me account “TrisidiaX”, he’s not trisidia, he is on my account and here is a post to prove that. he scammed players with my Skype and now he will try to do the same on this community

https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,666658.msg4457338.html#msg4457338[/quote]

item.title: Project 2006 RSPS
item.dc:creator: @TrisidiaX TrisidiaX
item.description:
@TrisidiaX wrote:

kaxman:

been playing a few days, think the community rocks,…everyone talks about 06 remakes being dead, well I think its because no ones capturing the vipe of 06…they dont have open world with all things as they where, they have owners who do everything but take care of business, and give in to a couple of players, who demand changes play a week max out than move on…NOT here…friendly and fun, captures the true vipe of 06, staff already in place(pre-launch). My gf and I have been running the wheels off this one, have played hundreds of these looking for the real deal and have found a home…PLEASE…join us, my in game username is:rebel look me up…peace

Means alot to the team, we aim to please:)

Read full topic
